summary.Title: Automation System Tester
summary.Presentation: We are looking for a skilled Automation System Tester with the primary focus to design, implement and execute automated tests on our satellite terminal or infrastructure systems. S

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a skilled Automation System Tester with the primary focus to design, implement and execute automated tests on our satellite terminal or infrastructure systems. Specification and execution of manual test cases will also be part of the tasks.

You will be part of our R&D teams on various terminal or infrastructure projects. Together with the Test team your job will be to identify test scenarios suitable for test automation. After specification and manual execution, you will design, implement and execute the automated test in the target environment. Our auto-test environment is based on Python, Pytest and Selenium using a BDD notation being executed from Jenkins.

As a System Tester your role will also be to represent our end users and ensure they get the best product. You must therefore also be able to work independently and in a structured manner and take responsibility for us delivering a product with a high quality.

As an Automation System Tester your key responsibilities will be:

 

- Preparation of test specifications based on product requirements

 

- Design and construction of test and auto-test environments

 

- Identify test scenarios suitable for test automation

 

- Design, implementation and execution of scripts for automated testing

 

- Verification and validation of new features and bug fixes

 

- Troubleshooting and description of observed errors

 

- Regression testing and Release testing of new Software releases

 

 

What you’ve done before:

- Verification of functions and requirements by execution of manual and automated tests

- Background as an engineer with experience in testing or development on embedded systems

- Able to design and describe test scenarios based on requirements and function descriptions

- Good knowledge of telecommunication networks and network protocols

- Experience with script programming

- Used to working in a Linux R&D environment

- Experience with interface to customers and outsourcing partners

 

We offer:

- Stable, permanent employment based on your choice (UoP/B2B)

- Remote hybrid option – we’d love to see you a few times a month

- Personal development budget

- Insurance

- Stay-on bonus

- Central and modern office space in Kraków

- Onboarding trip to Copenhagen

- Flat management structure following a Scandinavian work culture

- Which other benefits are important to you? Let us know!

 

#jobsforukraine
